name: !!!Down To Earth!!!
description:
VR based Shooter.  crouch to slide, pressed trigger to shoot. Your character will spawn to next level once cleared all the mission( killed all the enemy) in the current level. there is two level in this game currently. so join in to my world and have some fun.

If you don't have a VR glasses don't worry here is some pictue and viedo off our game
